reviews.review: too many cheaters. Especially when you first start the game and get yourself level up within the trust factor system. Your first 50 matches will be with cheater opponents.

The road and the philosophy of this game you should follow, is to never want to win.
One person on the enemy team is better than your whole team combined. You scoped right at the person but the bullet missed, and because of that you died. 

You're just having a bad day and blaming the game. 

You rage, you tilt, you shout. Don't do that.
You do that, because you aren't getting what you want. That's why you shouldn't want to win.
Just have fun, lose if you lose, win if you win. Winning is always the better option of those two of course.

But remember there will be good games and bad games, one loss doesn't mean the end of the world.
If you're losing many games in a row, then maybe think about training more, or taking a break to not lose again, and coming back to win another one and getting that feeling of "let's goooo".

Just calm down, wait for the next round, and try again.


Git gud,

 -g

Игра отличная, развивает реакцию, слух, мышление. Есть возрастное ограничение, объясню почему (для детишек):
1) Кровь 
2) Убийства (хоть и виртуальных персонажей)
3) Особенное комьюнити (не только русское), почти всегда есть брань (мат).
Читеры правда не перестали существовать (даже не прайме), но наказывают жестко, четко, в принципе быстро.
Вообще ксго стала лучше чем 1-2 года назад.
